name: AIA_RULE_Operation_CompareTwoValues
description: Expression rule that performs a comparison operation between two values
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!parameters: ri!parameters,
  local!context: ri!parameters.context,
  local!operator: local!context.ruleOperator,
  local!lhs: a!match(
    value: local!context.lhsType,
    equals: "expression",
    then: rule!AIA_ExtractJsonExpression(
      map: ri!parameters.instanceMap,
      expression: local!context.lhs
    ),
    equals: "field",
    then: index(ri!parameters.instanceMap, local!context.lhs, null),
    default: "lhs"
  ),
  local!rhs: a!match(
    value: local!context.rhsType,
    equals: "expression",
    then: rule!AIA_ExtractJsonExpression(
      map: ri!parameters.instanceMap,
      expression: local!context.rhs
    ),
    equals: "constant",
    then: local!context.rhs,
    equals: "field",
    then: index(ri!parameters.instanceMap, local!context.rhs, null),
    default: "lhs"
  ),
  local!todos: rule!SHRD_TODO(
    what: "
- Handle tables
- Handle different data types
"
  ),
  rule!AIA_RULE_DynamicBooleanOperation(
    valueOne: local!lhs,
    operator: local!operator,
    valueTwo: local!rhs
  )
)
